lead_paragraph: First quarter gross domestic product rose by 2.7 percent, helped by the weaker euro and by exports to the United States, but unemployment remained high.
snippet: First quarter gross domestic product rose by 2.7 percent, helped by the weaker euro and by exports to the United States, but unemployment remained high.

headline.main: Ireland’s Economy Posts First Growth in Two Years
headline.seo: Ireland’s Economy Posts First Growth in Two Years
headline.print_headline: Ireland’s Economy Posts First Growth in Two Years
